6110/A0/04/801/002.indicator_name: Average distance in miles of marginalized population to a functional birth registration point

6110/A0/04/801/002.headline: The Child Protection Programme continues to address social norms and behaviour that condones violent practices and ensures that impunity does not go unaddressed and unmeasured in the justice system.

6110/A0/04/801/002.status_value: a total of 290 (200 in 2015) professionals from key government ministries and agencies (social workers  school administrators  police  justice officials  medical practitioners  and others) were trained in responding and preventing child violence and abuse  including sexual violence
6110/A0/04/801/002.indicator_name: Existence of adequate functional and technical capacities within public institutions having a mandate to address sexual violence   violence against children and abuse
6110/A0/04/801/002.headline: The Child Protection Programme continues to address social norms and behaviour that condones violent practices and ensures that impunity does not go unaddressed and unmeasured in the justice system.

6110/A0/04/801/002.status_value: The Child Protection Task-Force is providing oversight to the implementation of the Ending Violence Road Map. Within the Government Ministers of Human Development  Health and Education have formed a Social Sector Caucus that meets quarterly to discuss issues of sexual abuse and violence and implementation of policies.
6110/A0/04/801/002.indicator_name: Key influencers reject sexual abuse and demand action for prevention and response
6110/A0/04/801/002.headline: The Child Protection Programme continues to address social norms and behaviour that condones violent practices and ensures that impunity does not go unaddressed and unmeasured in the justice system.

6110/A0/04/801/003.status_value: Currently all schools under Catholic Management are not implementing the complete HFLE curriculum. The Ministry of Education is currently adjusting the curriculum to meet the needs to all school managements.
6110/A0/04/801/003.indicator_name: Percentage of schools timetabling life skills (HFLE)

6110/A0/04/801/003.status_value: 100% of hospitals are certified as baby friendly. efforts are under way to certify all clinics as well.
6110/A0/04/801/003.indicator_name: Percentage of Baby Friendly Hospitals maintaining all 10 steps to successful breastfeeding

6110/A0/04/801/003.status_value: still 0% tests conducted locally  however  MOH have allocated the resources and equipment. In 2015  the facility was constructed however it is not expected to be functioning until 2016. STI screening still remains a part of prenatal check-ups.
6110/A0/04/801/003.indicator_name: Percentage of Polymerase Change Reaction (PCR) test conducted locally.(PMCTR)

6110/A0/04/801/003.status_value: Since 2015  100% of pregnant women who access medical services in these areas

6110/A0/04/801/003.status_value: Information will be provided by MICS5 in 2016

6110/A0/04/802/004.indicator_name: Number of municipalities measuring the well being of children and adolescents against key social indicators.
6110/A0/04/802/004.headline: The collaborative effort between UNICEF  UNDP  The Belize Mayor Association and the Ministry of Labour  Local Government and Rural Development for the Sustainable and Child Friendly Municipalities Initiative (SCFM) realized significant growth in 2016 as municipalities sought to claim ownership.

6110/A0/04/802/004.status_value: 9 municipalities are working towards being certified as child friendly.
6110/A0/04/802/004.indicator_name: Number of municipal governments agreeing to indicators measuring the performance of actions/ interventions toward improvements in quality of life  and gender and social inequities.
